verses.verse: <S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3947>get<s%> from them a <S%H4294>rod<s%> for each father's <S%H1004>household:<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H4294>rods,<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5387>leaders<s%> according to their fathers' <S%H1004>households.<s%> You shall <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> on his <S%H4294>rod,<s%>

and <S%H3789>write<s%> Aaron's <S%H8034>name<s%> on the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi;<s%> for there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> for the <S%H7218>head<s%> [of each] of their fathers' <S%H1004>households.<s%>

"You shall then <S%H5117>deposit<s%> them in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I <S%H3259>meet<s%> with you.

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H977>choose<s%> will <S%H6524>sprout.<s%> Thus I shall <S%H7918>lessen<s%> from upon Myself the <S%H8519>grumblings<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H9235>grumbling<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you."

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> therefore <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5387>leaders<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H259>apiece,<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H5387>leader<s%> according to their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H4294>rods,<s%> with the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H4294>rods.<s%>
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5117>deposited<s%> the <S%H4294>rods<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> had <S%H6524>sprouted<s%> and <S%H3318>put<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6525>buds<s%> and <S%H6692>produced<s%> <S%H6692>blossoms,<s%> and it <S%H1580>bore<s%> <S%H1580>ripe<s%> <S%H8247>almonds.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> then <S%H3318>brought<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4294>rods<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H4294>rod.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7725>"Put<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> as a <S%H226>sign<s%> against the <S%H4805>rebels,<s%> that you may <S%H3615>put<s%> an <S%H3615>end<s%> to their <S%H8519>grumblings<s%> <S%H4480>against<s%> <S%H5921><s%> Me, so that they should not <S%H4191>die.<s%>"
Thus <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did;<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, <S%H3651>so<s%> he <S%H6213>did.<s%>
Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> we <S%H1478>perish,<s%> we are dying, we are <S%H6>all<s%> dying!

<S%H3605>"Everyone<s%> who <S%H7131>comes<s%> <S%H7131>near,<s%> who <S%H7131>comes<s%> <S%H7131>near<s%> to the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> must <S%H4191>die.<s%> Are we to <S%H1478>perish<s%> <S%H8552>completely<s%>?"
